official_title: Improving Well-being Among Young Adult Survivors of Childhood Brain Tumor: A Randomized Controlled Trial of a Brief Internet-based Behavioral Activation Program
inclusion_criteria:
* History of childhood brain tumor
* Ages of 18 and 30 years.
* Have regular access to the Internet
* Provide an e-mail address
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 30 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Those that do not meet the inclusion criteria.
